configuration.title: Fuzzy Bookmarks
configuration.saveBookmarkDir.title: Save Bookmark Directory
configuration.saveBookmarkDir.descriptio: Set the directory where you want to save the bookmarks. A '`bookmarks.json`' file will be created under the directory you set.
configuration.directoryOpenType.title: Directory Open Type
configuration.directoryOpenType.descript: Set one of three types: '`terminal`', '`explorer`', or '`window`'.Set '`terminal`' to open the directory in a terminal. If '`explorer`' is set, the directory will be opened in the application explorer. If '`window`' is set, the directory will be opened in a new Window.
